subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{zh-div|國}} an ancient [[city-state]], now {{w|Hongdong County}} in [[Shanxi]]
# {{zh-div|國}} a later and larger state during the [[Warring States]] period of Chinese history
# {{zh-obsolete}} to [[run]]
# {{surname|lang=zh|dot=,}} listed first in the ''{{w|Baijiaxing}}''. It is the family name of the [[Song]] [[emperor]]s.
